text: This is a list of famous Russian writers who have written novels and/or short fiction. * Alexander Pushkin (d. 1837) * Nikolai Gogol (d. 1852), his hometown is in today's Ukraine * Fyodor Dostoyevsky (d. 1881) *Ivan Turgenev (d. 1883) *Anton Chekhov (d. 1904) * Leo Tolstoy (d. 1910) *Mikhail Bulgakov (d. 1940) * Boris Pasternak (d. 1960) * Vladimir Nabokov (d. 1977), he was Russian- American * Mikhail Sholokhov (d. 1984) * Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn (d. 2008) * Fazu Aliyeva (d. 2016) * Vladimir Sorokin (b. 1955) * Mikhail Shishkin (b. 1961) * Kira Yarmysh (b. 1989) ==Related pages== *List of Russian-language novelists * List of Russian writers Category:Russia-related lists
title: List of Russian novelists
